author: Special Correspondent
text:
Judicial officers and resource persons conducted an in-service training programme for judicial magisterial staff at the district court here on Saturday.

Judicial Magistrate K. Palaniammal enlightened the staff on provisions of sexual harassment of women at workplace, functioning of juvenile justice board, child welfare committee and various provisions of Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act (POCSA), 2012.

The Magistrate also covered subjects relating to Human rights and Right to Information Act. S. Venkataraman, Chief Administrative Officer, covered subjects relating to fundamental rules, Tamil Nadu treasury code, financial code, budget manual, Tamil Nadu pension rules and the proposal for pension and family pension.

He also dealt with gratuity, final settlement of General Provident Fund (GPF), missing credit adjustments and rules relating to GPF party final and GPF temporary advance and loans and advances.

He also enlightened the staff on maintenance of cash book and permanent advance register.

A. Manjula Devi, Court Manager, covered subjects such as reconciliation relating to the treasury office with civil court deposit and bills, lapsed deposits and e-Court project.
title: Training held
